import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { lostItemsData } from '../data/lostItemsData'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const featuredItems = lostItemsData.slice(0, 3); return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Preserving Lost Memories Every lost item has a story. Every story deserves to be found. Join our community in reuniting people with their precious belongings. Submit Lost Item Browse Archive
{/* Stats Section */}

Items in Archive

{/* Featured Items Section */}

Recently Lost Items

These precious items are waiting to be reunited with their owners. Can you help bring them home?

{featuredItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.reward}

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.location}
View Details →
))}
View All Items
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Our simple process helps reunite lost items with their owners

{[ { icon: "📝", title: "Submit Details", description: "Share information about your lost item including photos, description, and location" }, { icon: "🔍", title: "Community Search", description: "Our community helps search and spread the word about your lost item" }, { icon: "🎉", title: "Happy Reunion", description: "Get notified when someone finds your item and arrange for its return" } ].map((step, index) => (
{step.icon}

{step.title}

{step.description}

 ))}

); }; export default Home;
